title: Aiki, Vol. 01
description: AIKI is a manga series written and illustrated by Isutoshi. It is serialized in Young King Comics and published by Shonen Gahosha Co. AIKI features genres such as action and comedy, but be advised that there is also a certain amount of objectionable content. Its main theme is martial arts, and it revolves around the ups and downs of its main character: Joukyuu Kunitoshi.
author: Isutoshi
